quests.welcomeMsg: The message (at NPC site) when the quest is triggered
quests.objectiveMsg: Plain quest description for Quests overview
quests.completedMsg: Message displayed immediately after the quest is completed (optional)
quests.finishedMsg: Message displayed when returned to the quest issuer (optional)

quests.welcomeMsg:
Hello there,
I will teach you the basics.
Follow my instructions and you will be fine.
quests.completedMsg:
OK lad,
use 'w' or space to jump. and 'a', 'd' or arrows to move!
quests.finishedMsg: Now jump on that big box.

quests.welcomeMsg: Now jump on that big box.
quests.completedMsg:
Excellent,
To run hold shift.
If running you can jump higher and longer!

quests.welcomeMsg: Now run to the exit sign on the east!
quests.objectiveMsg: Go to the exit sign on the east.
quests.finishedMsg:
Listen up lad,
You did well...for a n00b.

The time is running out.
Now hurry to the white castle.
The real adventure merely begins!

quests.welcomeMsg:
You shall not pass...unless you bring me
knowledge of Kendo!
quests.finishedMsg:
What? Could it be...
You have the Kendo knowledge I need so much!

You must be the chosen one, proceed now!

quests.welcomeMsg:
Find our Hanshi - the great Kendo master,
he will train you. His dojo is on the east.


Beware of magic slimes!
quests.objectiveMsg: Find the Kendo master and his dojo on the east

quests.welcomeMsg:
I expected you!
First lesson: Fumikomi-ashi (jump attack).
Jump on the enemy and press 's' or down.


Lets practice Fumikomi-ashi,
collect 10 ki from magic slimes!
quests.completedMsg:
Quest completed!
Hurry back to the dojo!
quests.finishedMsg:
I saw little girls performing better Fumikomi-ashi.
You show no potential, but since you are the only
one around, lets practice some more.
